levels.levelDescription: In the Whispering Shadows, the ground is a mixture of eerie dark-dirt, and treacherous deep-dark-holes that seem bottomless. Soft whispers of the lurking evil can be heard as you cautiously tread upon the faintly illuminated paths.

Welcome to Gleaming Frostfall, where the frozen snow crunches beneath your feet, and shimmering water obstacles slow your progress. The air is frigid, carrying with it a sense of foreboding as you navigate through this winter wonderland.

Descend into the Chaos Abyss where rusty-chain-platforms sway precariously over pools of bubbling lava, threatening to engulf all who dare to challenge the legendary power of the Void Stalker. The air is thick with the smell of sulfur and the oppressive heat of the fiery pits.
